fails:Enumerator#each_cons iterates the block for each consecutive slice of n elements
fails:Enumerator#each_cons iterates over last tail slice
fails:Enumerator#each_cons stops iteration on exception
fails:Enumerator#each_cons walks Enumerable elements strictly in forward direction, in parallel with iteration
fails:Enumerator#each_cons allows Enumerable to change during the iteration
fails:Enumerator#each_cons raises LocalJumpError if no block is given
fails:Enumerator#each_cons raises ArgumentError for n <= 0
fails:Enumerator#each_cons raises RangeError for Bignum parameter
